item.title: Framework for capital allocation
item.description: Framework for capital allocation In this resource starved world, capital is scarced. Every dollar that you owned has its place and deserved to be allocated properly. Currently, I already have a huge chunk of capital tied up in a diversified portfolio levered up to 1.4 times. Portfolio is expected to outperform/ match up to market returns with 2 to 3 times lower risk - in terms of standard deviation and drawdown.
